field.label: Author(s)
field.hint: Enter the name(s) of the author(s) for this item:

field.label: Date of Distribution
field.hint: Please enter the date of any previous public publication or distribution. If this is the first time the item is being published, please enter today's date. You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter a description of the item. Please include specifics about course content, pedagogy, or any important features the item might have.

field.label: Subject
field.hint: Select a keyword from the list provided. If no keyword is appropriate, please select "Other" and enter one in the box below.

field.label: Subject (Other)
field.hint: If no keyword is appropriate, please enter one in the box provided.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter a descriptive title of the item.

field.label: Access to Item
field.hint: Please assign the desired item permissions. "Restricted" should be chosen only if the item contains information that the author(s) do/does not want to make publicly available, e.g. exam solutions.

field.label: Level
field.hint: Please select the educational level. If this does not apply, select "N/A".

field.label: Item Type
field.hint: Please select a category that best describes this item or set of items.

field.label: Accessibility Features
field.hint: Select all accessibility features that apply for this item. If unknown, please select "unknown".

field.label: Accessibility Hazards
field.hint: Select all accessibility hazards that apply for this item. If unknown, please select "unknown".
